Title: Kammatti Paadam
Writer: Ajithkumar (collaborating writer), P. Balachandran (script), Jay.k (collaboration in script), G. Sethunath (collaborating writer)
Actors: Dulquer Salmaan, Vinayakan, Shaun Romy, Anil Nedumangad
Plot: Krishnan embarks on a journey to find his childhood friend Ganga, whose life he suspects to be in danger.
